Pre-Game Insights: Wales will face Gibraltar at the Estadio Algarve, Portugal on Thursday, 6 June 2024, with a kick-off time of 5pm.
The match will be officiated by referee Jamie Robinson from Northern Ireland.

Wales squad includes notable players such as Danny Ward, Adam Davies, Tom King, Connor Roberts, Fin Stevens, Joe Rodon, Chris Mepham, Ben Cabango, Joe Low, Ben Davies, Jay DaSilva, Ethan Ampadu, Jordan James, Josh Sheehan, Charlie Savage, Charlie Crew, Brennan Johnson, Wes Burns, Rubin Colwill, Daniel James, Rabbi Matondo, Nathan Broadhead, Kieffer Moore, Liam Cullen, and Lewis Koumas.
Joe Rodon and Connor Roberts have withdrawn from the squad, with Matt Baker from Stoke called up as a replacement.
Wales will be wearing yellow for the match against Gibraltar.
The Wales squad will travel to Portugal on Sunday, 2 June 2024.
